name: Color Factory (luccasdam)
description:
History Background:

    The color factory is down! The colorful world as we know it is at risk and needs your help. Your mission in Color Factory is to overcome the challenges of producing each color and make deliveries while there's time to keep the world from going black and white.

    Get ready to experience a fun game with simple but challenging mechanics. You can play alone or with your friends.

How to play:

In Color Factory you command the production line for the world's colors.

In each stage, the difficulty increases, with new challenges, themes and speed.

To be able to do well, it is necessary to be agile and know how to divide tasks efficiently.

The main commands:

*Moves (W, A, S, D);

*Dash (LEFT SHIFT);

*Interaction Key (F);

*Swap Characters (Q and E);

The rules:

*See the order with the requested color;

*Take the pot;

*Place the color equivalent in the machine;

*Pull the lever;

*Find the exact color;

*Make the delivery;

Production Specifications:

-The game will be produced on Unreal Engine 4;

-Programming language: C++ together with Blueprints;

-Release Platforms, PC (steam) and Nintendo Switch.

*Single Player or Co-op Multiplayer;

*Target audience: casual players aged 15 to 24.

Team Name: Just the two of us.

Team Members:

-Luccas de Avila Machado - Programmer and 3D Artist;

-Camila Correa Rodrigues de Oliveira - Business and Marketing.

Main Theme: Colors and Paint.

Category: "Desafio Anjo das Tintas"

Diversifiers:

-No code: Made only using UE4 blueprints

-Run-running: The game must use time as the determining factor.

*/
